page.title: 04NOTABLE EVENTS IN SEAFORD
page.content: EVERY YEAR THERE IS A{FUN RUN }DOWN ON THE SEAFRONT. IT IS ORGANISED BY SEAFORD PLAY COUNCIL. AT THE START THERE ARE TWO PEAPLE AT A DESK WHO GIVE YOU A NUMBER. THE COST IS 50P FOR A CHILD AND Â£1 FOR AN ADULT AND Â£3.50 FAMILY TICKET. AT THE FINISH THEY GIVE YOU A DRINK OF ORANGE AND A LOLLY. THERE ARE{FISHING COMPETITIONS}HELD BY THE SEAFORD SAILING CLUB. THERE ARE NICE PRIZES. EVERY YEAR THERE IS A {FUN FAIR,}IT TAKES PLACE AT THE FIELD OPPOSITE CORSICA HALL AND THERE ARE DODGEMS, ARCADES, CROSS OVER ROUND ABOUTS; IT IS GREAT FUN. EVERY YEAR THERE IS A{GAMES TOURNEY (SPORTS)}AT THE SALTS RECREATION GROUND. THERE ARE MANY EVENTS. THERE IS ALSO A{GOLF {TOURNAMENT}HELD AT SEAFORD HEAD GOLF COURSE, FOR AMATEUR GOLFERS. THERE IS A NICE TROPHY.{A FIREWORK DISPLAY}IS HELD IN NOVEMBER AT THE FIRE STATION.
